concept.title: Retrieving Expiration Dates for Currently Registered Timers

section.p: If you want to check when the currently registered timers expire, proceed as follows using the operator Web client:

ol.li: From the operation list, select retrievetimerexpirations and click select.

section.p: The expiration dates for the currently registered timers are displayed.

conbody.section:
The syntax of the respective CLT command is as follows:
java -jar oscm-operatorsvc-client.jar <userkey> <password> retrievetimerexpirations
